definition: to kill oneself/suicide
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
to commit suicide by biting off one's tongue

sentences.english: The second emperor committed suicide; Zhao Gao eventually was killed.
sentences.chinese: 秦朝第二个皇帝自尽而死，赵高被杀。

sentences.english: The kidnapper is yulia tutor, see his jump off a building suicide.
sentences.chinese: 绑匪是尤丽亚的家教老师，见事情败露便跳楼自尽。

sentences.english: She threw into river and killed herself because of despair.
sentences.chinese: 她由于绝望而投河自尽。

sentences.english: The final generation of Americans known to the world can not be tolerated, swallowed their anger himself.
sentences.chinese: 一代美人终不能见容于世，含恨自尽。

sentences.english: He hanged himself from a beam in the attic.
sentences.chinese: 他在阁楼上悬梁自尽了。

sentences.english: After several days, Poison Wang was in such agony that he chewed off his own tongue and died.
sentences.chinese: 几天后，王毒药受不了这种折磨，咬舌自尽了。

sentences.english: Finally she hanged herself from the rafters and grudged in the world.
sentences.chinese: 最后她悬梁自尽遗恨在人间。

sentences.english: Qu later drowned himself in a river.
But continuing official apathy has forced the farmers to take their lives, Tiwari said.
sentences.chinese: 但是，提瓦里说，官方持续的冷漠逼得这些农民自尽。

sentences.english: He'd get delighted when he received a phone call about a shotgun suicide.
sentences.chinese: 他接到一个饮弹自尽的电话后会眉飞色舞。

sentences.english: He committed suicide when the collapse of the Third Reich was imminent (1945).
sentences.chinese: 1945年德意志第三帝国垮台时，希特勒饮弹自尽。

sentences.english: Huang Jiu with scissors stabbing by safflower, safflower and block wall himself.
sentences.chinese: 黄久之被红花用剪刀捅死了，红花也拦墙自尽了。

sentences.english: Wu Bright Moon, see the assassination fail, then plunge a suicide.
sentences.chinese: 吴月娘见行刺不成，便投河自尽了。

sentences.english: She hanged herself out of despair.

sentences.chinese: 在悲痛中他悬梁自尽了。

sentences.english: Meng was driven to despair and threw herself into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 孟姜女彻底绝望，投海自尽。
